snippet.title: Minecraft x Ben 10 DLC: Official Trailer
snippet.description:
It’s time to go hero because Ben 10 is coming to Minecraft! Help Ben, Gwen, and Grandpa Max defeat the alien invasion by recovering the missing DNA and transforming into alien heroes to defeat villains like Vilgax, Zombozo, and Kevin 11. Play in Story Mode or Free Roam Mode in the Ben 10 DLC, available now in Minecraft Marketplace!

AUDIO DESCRIPTION version is here: https://youtu.be/BFYUmLCljq8
